application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
description: Details pursuant to the partial discharge of Condition 16 (Part i, c only - Contamination) of planning application reference 2102/APP/2018/4231 (Redevelopment of the site to provide three buildings ranging from 2 to 10 storeys in height delivering 331 residential units and 710 sq.m of ground floor commercial floorspace (Use Classes A1, A2, A3, B1, D1 or D2), including the provision of private and communal amenity areas, child play space, car parking, secure cycle parking, refuse storage areas and other associated development (AMENDED MAY 2019)).
decision_conditions: The applicant is advised that this consent relates to Part i, c only of Condition 16 of planning application reference 2102/APP/2018/4231. The remaining elements of the condition, part ii and part iii remain and will require further details to be submitted in order to be discharged.
